Summary: I was heading south, noticed pulsating chrome coloured object travel from west to east covering a large distance in seconds, lost sight as it went behind a cloud.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around August 8th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was driving south on the deerpark bypass in melbourne at 2:48pm 8th august 2013 when i noticed a pulsating silver\chrome oval object traveling across the sky from west to east direction, first i thought it might be a plane but it was way to fast so i thought it must be much closer to me than it looks but it disappeared behind distant clouds so it must have been higher and further away than i thought, i quickly looked around the sky and a plane caught my eye and was moving very slow in comparison and the plane looked black. i have no explanation as to what i saw.
